sentence.Network_en: I execrate people who deceive and tell lies.
sentence.Network_cn: 我憎恶那些欺骗和说谎的人。

sentence.Network_en: Shall execrate you with the ungodly.
Those that bless you I will bless, those that curse you, I will execrate.
sentence.Network_cn: 我将祝福那些祝福你的人, 我也将诅咒那些诅咒你的人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 字根字尾构词法.doc - 豆丁网 ... excuse 原谅 execrate 咒骂 execute 执行,处死,处决.
松松：3天背完GR... ... redress:n. 赔偿, 救济, 矫正 17。 execrate:vt. 痛骂, 憎恨, 憎恶, 诅咒 18。 petulance:n. 闹气, 性急 19。.
GRE 同义词总结大全 ... pan v． 严厉批评，n．平底锅 execrate v. 憎恶，咒骂 | invective n． 猛烈抨击，痛骂.

list.abs: telerobot system can be widely used in altitude exploration , deep-ocean exploitation , remote task or dangerous and execrable task environment .遥机器人系统可广泛应用于高空探索、深海开发、远程作业或者是人类难以到达的危险、恶劣的作业环境中。
others execrate it , like Beccaria ., 有些人痛恨它 , 如贝卡里亚.
abominable treatment of prisoners ; detestable vices ; execrable crimes ; consequences odious to those you govern - Edmund Burke ., 对犯人进行令人发指的虐待 ; 令人憎恶的恶行 ; 可憎的罪行 ; 你统治的结果是令人憎恶的.
An execrable place in the winter , Paris !, 冬天的巴黎真是一个可恶的地方!

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin exsecrat- 'cursed', from the verb exsecrari, based on sacrare 'dedicate' (from sacer 'sacred')

means.word_mean: 2. curse or declare to be evil or anathema or threaten with divine punishment
